title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Israel says it received remains of 3 hostages from Gaza as fragile ceasefire holds
items.description: Israel says the remains of three hostages have been handed over from Gaza and will be examined by forensic experts as a month-old ceasefire holds.

items.title: In Chicago, a Halloween weekend of immigration arrests and violence

items.title: I built this 'AI aunt' for women after family tragedy in South Africa
items.description: An AI chatbot and app for victims of abuse to get help is being piloted in South Africa.

items.title: Uncertainty over federal food aid rises as shutdown fight continues
items.description: Rulings by two federal judges eased pressure on SNAP benefits, although President Trump said payments are likely to be delayed.

items.title: Hamas hands over three coffins it says contain bodies of Gaza hostages
items.description: The remains will undergo formal identification in Israel, as the return of deceased hostages under a ceasefire continues.

items.title: At least eight dead after magnitude-6.3 earthquake hits Afghanistan
items.description: The quake struck near Mazar-e Sharif, one of Afghanistan's largest cities, in the early hours of Monday.

items.title: 10/29: The Daily Report
items.description: Lindsey Reiser reports on the damage left behind in Jamaica after Hurricane Melissa, and what to expect when President Trump meets with President Xi.

items.title: World awaits landmark US Supreme Court decision on Trump's tariffs
items.description: The top US court will decide if many of Trump's tariffs are legal in a case with major implications for presidential power and billions of dollars.

items.title: Kenyan runners win men's and women's races in New York City Marathon
items.description: Kipruto, an Olympic bronze medalist, narrowly beat fellow Kenyan Alexander Mutiso in the Pro Men's race, as both men finished with a time of 2:08:09.
